function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential failure of vaccine efficacy in later clinical trials","Impact":"Delay in vaccine development and population immunity, leading to prolonged spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough pre-clinical testing, closely monitor adverse effects, and continue to improve vaccine design","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods, data analytics for adverse event monitoring","People":"Clinical trial participants, general population","Owner":"Vaccine developers, regulatory authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate public trust in traditional vaccine development methods","Impact":"Reduced uptake of vaccines, hindering efforts to achieve herd immunity","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, education on vaccine safety and efficacy, community engagement","Technologies":"Interactive communication platforms, social media monitoring","People":"General population, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health authorities, communication experts, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Global collaboration and resource allocation challenges","Impact":"Delays in vaccine development, unequal access to vaccines, and limited support in outbreak regions","Mitigation":"Establish clear international cooperation frameworks, allocate resources based on need and urgency, support capacity building in low-resource settings","Technologies":"International collaboration platforms, supply chain management systems, data-driven resource allocation tools","People":"Global health organizations, low-resource countries, vaccine manufacturers","Owner":"International health organizations, government agencies, philanthropic organizations"}]}
